title: Bloomberg Markets: Hurricane Equifax Is a Category 5 Breach
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Hurricane Equifax Is a Category 5 Breach
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Brad Stone Senior Executive Editor of Global Technology Bloomberg News Discussing Equifax Inc., one of America’s three major credit bureaus, revealing last week that its website had been breached and that the names, Social Security numbers, birthdates, addresses and driver’s license numbers of 143 million Americans may have been comprised.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
